DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the study drug compared to placebo in the treatment of cognitive impairment in men with schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Cognitive Impairment in Men With Schizophrenia (MK5757-005)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patient is male between 21 and 55 years of age Duration of the illness must be longer than 1 year Patient's current antipsychotic medication regimen must be stable Patient is negative for selected drugs of abuse at Screening Must be in a stable living arrangement for at least 3 months prior to screening (not a homeless shelter) Patient has mental retardation Undergone Electroconvulsive Therapy (ECT) treatment within 6 months prior to screening Has suicidal attempts or ideation within the last 12 months Patient has a history of alcohol/drug dependence within 1 year or alcohol/drug abuse within 12 months of starting the study
